thread.title: India Beats 25 Countries To Win An Award During London Fashion Week
thread.title_full: India Beats 25 Countries To Win An Award During London Fashion Week

author: Hrishitaa Sharma
title: India Beats 25 Countries To Win An Award During London Fashion Week
text:
A post shared by Lakmé Fashion Week (@lakmefashionwk) on Feb 20, 2017 at 7:43am PST 
Remember the time our very own emerging designers packed their bags for London to participate at the Indian Fashion Showcase during London Fashion Week ’17 ? Well looks like they didn’t just participate but also won an award with flying colours. That’s right! Making us all proud at a global platform, they bagged The International Fashion Showcase Country Award – India for ‘The Indian Pastoralists.’ 
A total of 81 designers from 26 countries participated at the Indian Fashion Showcase during London Fashion Week but only one country emerged as the winner of the award. Heartiest congratulations to Agni by Ujjawal Dubey , Ikai by Ragini Ahuja , Ka-Sha by Karishma Shahani Khan , P.E.L.L.A by Priyanka Ella Lorena Lama and Kaleekal By Alan Alexander . A post shared by Lakmé Fashion Week (@lakmefashionwk) on Feb 19, 2017 at 10:48pm PST And this is what they had to say after the win! A post shared by Lakmé Fashion Week (@lakmefashionwk) on Feb 20, 2017 at 1:06am PST 
You make us so proud! Send in your good wishes to these talented designers by commenting below. 1 TAGS
